column2:
```r
# Generate variables for ease of identifying beneficiaries and ease of delivering payments
infra <- infra %>% mutate(ease_id = .5*has_id+.25*soc_ins+.25*soc_reg_coverage,
                          branches = ifc_i_branches_A1_pop + ifc_i_ATMs_pop,
                          ease_pay = (has_account-1)*pmax(1-branches/150,0)+1)

```
